document.text:
Fro 
Subject: e: 
investigation 
Date: Fri, 05 Jun 2020 19:34:4 
Appreciate the courtesy. Please do not pass on our contact info. That said, feel free to contact us if anything 
comes up in 
your investigation. 
Thank you. Hope you guys are all hanging in okay. 
On Jun 
5, 2020, at 3:19 PM, vrote: 
[EXTERNAL EMAIL] 
Brendan, 
An attorney for an individual who has an active civil case in connection with Epstein has reached out to us to ask if we 
know the current counsel for 
-I
 assume that the attorney is seeking to serve a request or subpoena for 
documents and/or testimony, though we haven't asked specifically. 
I don't think we ordinaril en a  e on that type of question, but given that we have been in touch with you in connection 
with our interview of Mr if you'd like we can pass along your contact info, so that the attorney goes to you 
rather than attempting to contact or serve Mr directly. And if not, of course no problem, and we'll just let him 
know that we're not able to comment one way or the other on the status of any counsel. Whatever you prefer. 
Thanks, and hope you're well these days. 
From 
Sent: Friday, February 07, 2020 18:36 
To: 
Cc: 
Subjec : : roves iga ion 
Thanks 
Fronl 
Sent: rriaay, i-eoruary b.13 rm 
To: 
Quigley, Brendan 
EFTA00022356

Subject: RE: SONY investigation 
[EXTERNAL EMAIL] 
Brendan, 
As promised, attached please find a copy of the proffer agreement signed today. 
Confidentiality Notice: 
The information contained in this email and any attachments is intended only for the recipient[s] listed above and may be privileged 
and confidential. Any dissemination, copying, or use of or reliance upon such information by or to anyone other than the recipient[s] 
listed above is prohibited. If you have received this message in error, please notify the sender immediately at the email address 
above and destroy any and all copies of this message. 
EFTA00022357
